sen.j: 冷泉 為系（れいぜい ためつぎ、1881年 - 1946年）は日本の歌人。
sen.e: Tametsugi REIZEI (1881 - 1946) was a Japanese poet.
Tametsugi REIZEI (1881 - 1946) was a Japanese poet.
Tametsugi REIZEI (1881 - 1946) was a Japanese poet.
The twenty-second head of the Kami Reizei family.
He was the twenty-second head of the Kami Reizei family.
He was the twenty-second head of the Kami Reizei family.

sen.j: 妻は水無瀬忠輔の娘・恭子。
sen.e: His wife was Kyoko, daughter of Tadasuke MINASE.
His wife was Kyoko, a daughter of Tadasuke MINASE.
His wife was Kyoko, a daughter of Tadasuke MINASE.

sen.j: 子は冷泉為臣、冷泉布美子。
sen.e: His children were Tameomi REIZEI and Fumiko REIZEI.
His children were Tameomi REIZEI and Fumiko REIZEI.
His children were Tameomi REIZEI and Fumiko REIZEI.
